title: Incorrect ranked Border
body: Hi, ive noticed for a while now that i no longer have a gold ranked border even though i was gold 5 last season and now when i hover over my rank it says last season "bronze 1" This makes no sense as i already have victorious Oriana as it was 2018 gold and above ranked rewards. How can i fix this ?

replies.body: Yeah its really unfair especially when i got all my rewards as well !
Yep, I got the same problem. I was gold at the end of S8, but it says Im now silver 2. Just wondering anyone can fix it:(
